“I’m planting a tree to learn from it how to gather strength from the deepest of roots”, a quote that every phytophile would just concord on. “GREEN FINGERS” is an app created to assist the strength of yours. Meticulously used, it could be a cornerstone for a plant lover.
No longer blame yourself for forgetting to water your plants. The core purpose of the app is to give the user notification based on weather outside. The salient features of the app includes:- · Give you timely notifications to take care of your plants. · Use the weather forecast and calculate how many times you have to water if at all it is essential for you to water. · Check out your peer gardeners’ progress
What the user have to do? Download the app Give your garden a fancy name. Give the soil type available Select plants from the projected soil type which suits the user based on the data shown Sit back and read notifications and water the plants.
Sounds interesting? Than why waiting? Do your part to revive the dying Earth. After all, A Green Home is a Clean Home.
